comments:
I had several editors open.
Some of them had been checked in via clearcase outside of Eclipse.
When I did File->Close All, I get the dialog about "The file has
been changed on the file system. Do you want to load the changes?"

I press Yes, and the NPE dialog pops open with the following exception
in the log file:

(FYI - This is 3.0M8)

can you recreate this on R3.0?

No, I have not been able to reproduce this problem.
Close All in 3.0 now appears to just close them all without checking for changes,
because I don't see the file changed dialog anymore.


(What is the etiquette in bugzilla on closing bugs? I'll leave it up to you.)

(The etiquette varies from person to person, but generally if you are the only 
person who saw the problem, it is safe to close it as 'WORKSFORME' if the bug 
owner says they haven't done any work on the problem.) 
 
Closing as WORKSFORME.  Please re-open if you see this problem again.
